name: Rota est Alea
description:
Incredible (truly not credible) physics based 3D platformer, inspired by qwop.

You are Legius Mercurius, a roman legionaire of unmatched strenght. Your task will be to supply wheels to the frontlines in this desert campaign. Take wheels from the wheel jar and deliver them to the flags to increase the number of wheels delivered.

Acta Rota est Alea

Control scheme:

  • SDF - Left Leg controls
  • JKL - Right Leg controls
  • FJ - bend knee
  • DK - move leg
  • SL - sideways leg rotation
  • Spacebar - Interact with object
  • Esc - Give up
